Simple...

<fc-chart fc-chart-type="Column3D" fc-data="salesData">

Or Complex

<fc-chart
    fc-chart-type="{{settings.type}}"
    fc-data="/sales/:month"
    fc-param-month="{{month}}"
    fc-caption="Sales for {{month}}" >
